means: 女性统治的社会组织形态，母权制，母系氏族制

sentence.Network_en: That is due to the matriarchy of its society.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是因为他们仍然是母系社会。

sentence.Network_en: Thai's female worship dated back to the en of matriarchy.
sentence.Network_cn: 泰民族对女性的崇拜源自母系社会时期人们的本能意识的升华.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英文的母权（matriarchy）这个字，是对应于父权这个字（patriarchy）而创的，字源是希腊文的 matēr（母亲）与 ar.
– 父权制(Patriarchy) – 母权制(Matriarchy) – 平权家庭(Egalitarian family) 8 █图10-1: 美国家户中的家庭型态,1940–2000年 9   功能论观点 – 家庭的.

matriarchate：女家长制社会matriarchy：女家长制, 女族长制matriclan：母系氏族

entry.def: A matriarchy is a system in which power or property is passed from mother to daughter.

means.word_mean: 1. a form of social organization in which a female is the family head and title is traced through the female line

auth_sentence.content: The nomadic world had been a matriarchy.
auth_sentence.res_content: The nomadic world had been a matriarchy.
